name: Mercy Chinwo
description: '''Mercy Nnenda Chinwo''' (born 5 September 1990), known professionally as '''Mercy Chinwo''' or '''Mercy Chinwo-Blessed''', is a [[Nigerians|Nigerian]] gospel singer, songwriter, and actress. She gained recognition after winning the second season of ''[[Nigerian Idol]]''. In 2017, she signed a recording contract with EeZee Conceptz. Chinwo has released the albums ''The Cross: My Gaze'' (2018), ''Satisfied'' (2020), ''Overwhelming Victory'' (2024), and ''In His Will'' (2025).
